description: Established by Brent and Cheryl Caffee in honor of a family of educators, this scholarship recognizes a UCO student who is a History major and has high academic achievement and strong writing skills. Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate enrolled for semester received Minimum GPA 3.25 History major Attach a 10-12 page paper on American History

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
